show.title: Jerk Punishment Club
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/Myp8km
show.description: A fearless young woman creates a secret club to punish men who mistreat women. Fueled by her sister’s pain, her mission for vengeance quickly escalates. A bold, thrilling tale of justice, rebellion, and a fight to right every wrong.
show.description_secondary: A fearless young woman creates a secret club to punish men who mistreat women. Fueled by her sister’s pain, her mission for vengeance quickly escalates. A bold, thrilling tale of justice, rebellion, and a fight to right every wrong.
